attributes.action: Remove VAT from all sources of Domestic Renewable Energy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an effort to promote the use of Domestic Renewable Sources of Energy, we appeal to The Government for the removal of VAT from all sources of Domestic Renewable Energy, i.e. Wind turbines & Solar Power.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Remove VAT from all sources of Domestic Renewable Energy."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12273.asp
